39504500.review:
For those who remember Commandos, this game is quite good.

Just don't be a quicksave basterd. Remember to save it properly when you think you have progress a lot in a mission...or else you had to start all over again just because you fucked up and accidentally quicksave.

39503633.review: 能和当年的舍伍德森林媲美的小品级策略游戏。相当出色。

39502512.review: 很好玩的一款游戏，但是对于我来说乐趣居然是把敌人全部杀了，然后整张地图里我就可以为所欲为了。很容易上瘾，不打完一关坚决不休息的那种。最后给要买的朋友们说一下，一定要随时记得存档！！！！一定要敢于尝试，该狂战士无双的时候就不要怂

39501919.review:
几需体验三番钟，里造会干我一样，爱上介款游戏
PS：玩盗版时的存档也会载进来

39500797.review:
玩了30多个小时，差一关通关了，说说个人对这个游戏的感受。游戏的整体玩法，剧情，画面都属上乘，因为用手柄玩的，所以视角调节简直了，高度时高时低，中心视角有时候可以用，有时候就是个摆设，需要用到中心视角的时候，切半天切不回去，不知道是不是BUG，还有一点就是读取的速度，也是没谁了。
游戏整体需要玩家非常好的耐心，本人比较喜欢这类游戏，像狙击精英啊这种都是考验细心，耐心的游戏，可玩到这个游戏，我发现我的耐心一点都不好，对于强迫症外加完美主义者的我来说，一关死几十次，存档几十次，读档几十次都是正常的，因为要操控两到三个人物，所以相互间的配合，时机的掌握，都必须恰到好处，我是不知道，官方设置的一关20分钟过，要怎样去完成，我是一周目，所以没试过行不行。
总之，游戏可玩性很高，但如果你是个急性子，暴脾气，就不适合这款游戏了，建议去看看视频就好，自己入手就算了，气疯到时其次，主要的是你会有砸电脑的冲动。

39500476.review:
I'm just writing a quick review before sleeping. With time, I will give a further analysis.

[h1]Average Score: 7.2/10
Personal Score: [b][u]A[/u][/b]. It's a [b]MUST HAVE[/b][/h1]

This game is [b][u]TOTALLY AWESOME![/u][/b] Just make sure it fits your tastes. 

Consider the following characteristics:

[list][*]Isometric graphics
[*]Mouse controlled movement
[*]Tactical stealth action
[*]Multi Character Management
[*]Lots of hotkeys and Action queueing 
[/list]

If you enjoyed reading these tags, this game is honey to you. Otherwise, please watch some video reviews and gameplays. [b]This may not be your game!!![/b]

Quick review averages:
[list][*][b]General:[/b]
[list][*][b]Mechanics: 7.5/10.[/b] Mostly good. Sometimes you'll get frustrated with some miss clicks, but the game does have the feedbacks. It could be improved tho.

[*][b] Graphics: 7.5/10.[/b] Great, optimized, with cartoon shader. Biggest let down that I can't zoom too close tho. Probably because of the graphic quality, characters may look low poly from really close up. 

[*][b]Content/Surprises: 7/10.[/b] So far, not many surprises, but a lot of new content introduced every stage. Been kept entertained. [b]⚠Bear in mind that I have not beat the game yet.⚠[/b]

[*][b]Lore/Story: 7/10[/b] Nice Edo Japan story. Well set, I read almost every main dialogue. I'm usually not even attracted to stories in general, so this in one is good. But nothing extremely amazing so far.[b]⚠Bear in mind that I have not beat the game yet.⚠[/b]

[*][b]Music/Sound: 7/10.[/b] It's hard for a game to have a music that does not bore after 10 hours. I consider this an average.
[/list]

[*]Plus and Cons:

[list]
[*][b]+Voice acting: 8.5/10.[/b] Voice acting is so amazing, pushing this game score up. Just wish there was subtitles even for the random chatter characters say when you give them actions. Soldiers have limited voices, but only noticeable if you're picky (like me).

[*][b]-Scum saving: 6/10.[/b] Let's be fair: Most of the coolest games you've played after 2007 are prone to scum saving, and most of the time, because we want something to go extremely perfect. This game it's not that hard to actually make you scum save, but if you want a situation to go down exactly how you picture it, you'll F5/F8 a lot.
[/list]
[/list]
[h1]I recommend buying it...
[list]
[*]If you're into the tags mentioned above.
[*]If the game's on sale, and you liked it, but does not have the money.
[/list]
Dont buy it...
[list]
[*]If you're not into the tags, or is just curious. Look for the bad reviews, and watch some videos, to be sure.
[/list]
[/h1]

39500144.review: 这款游戏很需要耐心和头脑，对于策略性的玩家再适合不过了！

39500035.review: 不错的游戏 很有意思

39497576.review: Jogo muito bem feito no estilo commandos. Pra quem ta com saudade deste estilo esse é o jogo. Jogo de paciencia e estratégia com graficos cartunizados e com várias funções.

39495940.review: "Quickload Tactics: 10 lines of dialoge on repeat" started out okay and turned into a repetitive unfun chore of a game. I guess I could have went to youtube and watched a solution to the last mission but it didn't really seem worth the effort. I ultimately stopped, because I couldn't stand hearing the same lines of dialoge OVER AND OVER AND OVER AND OVER AND OVER. I think the final level is so terrible because the entire QC team went insane.

39495199.review:
很棒的游戏，很棒的剧情和画风
有很多有趣的成就，冷不丁解锁的隐藏成就使自己在游戏时很有成就感
可能大多数人都会选择日语配音，但我个人还是更喜欢英配，尤其是两个女孩的声音与角色本色很相配，其次是的琢磨的英配也有一种历经风桑的韵味
全成就就算了吧，徽章的成就实在是无力

39493675.review: i've only played with gamepad. the camera is abysmal.  all the other hard work that went into the game looks great. seems a struggle to set up your view, esp. if a turm involves needing to move the camera live while performing character actions. Auto-center works until you stop moving or change direction. A simple on and off to this behavior would have made the experience so much better. Level 10 with the automatic camera jumping to different height levels combined with the illogical rotation center has made me stop playing a game which should be amazing. i also experienced repeatable bugs with the mechanism to move characters automatically. on more than one occassion, a character would ignore the command and start off walking on an automated path.

39493223.review: Sabır ve ciddi anlamda düşünce isteyen çok keyifli bir oyun. Şiddetle tavsiye ederim :)

39491833.review: Strateiji ve gizlilik içeren oyunları sevenlere kesinlikle öneriyorum

39491542.review: A game that would be a masterpiece for decades if it had multiplayer + level editor

39491213.review: This game is fantastic. It's tactical stealth elevated to art. Every little feature in the game works perfectly together to create one of the most enjoyable stealth games I have played in a long time.

39490294.review: 绝对的佳作！此类游戏能让你在当下都是快餐式的游戏堆里找到一个相当锻炼心智和耐心的地方。它没有动作游戏那种带感的连招连杀COMBO让你瞬间充满快感，却有着动作游戏那种听到杀敌音效和角色喊话时就会兴奋的魅力。它也没有RTS那种高APM操作让你手脑同步运算如飞的要求，却有着让你无数次尝试失败GG后，调整策略再细思做出深谋远虑的成功步骤后让你成就感满点的燃感。在整个游戏过程中，基本可以让你深深被代入并无暇去顾及其它事，步步为营，招招必中，让你在游戏每成功击杀一个敌人都会露出会心一笑。

39487369.review: 这游戏是真的好玩，童年的旧曲新谱，但是我要给差评，游戏里有致命的恶性bug，比如第13关过场动画卡住不推进，强行跳过之后出现无法移动镜头等花式bug，恶心至极，等修复

39511820.review:
An amazing game. You can see that everything was created with a lot of love (to the detail), from the starting mission to the credits. The gameplay is only surpassed by the story and characters. It is touching and has you hooked up. The characters grow you to the heart and their ingame dialog either when something in the story happend or you made them do something just sucks you in the game and makes you feel for the characters.
I have to say that i cant say mutch about the gameplay since i havent played many stealth games bevore. But it gives the player a lot of different ways to approach an objective. Most of the time i was just looking around the map imagening different scenarios and their outcome.
Even if you dont like stealth games or have never played one. I can only recomend it to you. If not only because of the characters and details.

39511513.review: 太肝了这游戏，建议上班族业余没多少时间的还是别入，刚回家打开游戏玩完一关发现尼玛都可以洗洗睡了，可玩性很高，操作性很强，缺点就是贼耗时间，可惜老了玩不动了，还是玩点即时射击或者休闲点的游戏好了

39509060.review:
Yo este juego lo considero como la versión avanzada y optimizada de Commandos, una saga que tuvo su voz en España. Aunque hay características que se echan de menos, como por ejemplo un multijugador en el cual, los jugadores eligen uno o varios personajes para trabajar en equipo, por lo demás es un juego que pone realmente a prueba el jugador. Es más, una de las cosas que tiene, y que se hizo intencionadamente dada la alta dificultad que tiene es el hecho de poder hacer ataques simultáneos desde un modo especial que es el modo sombra.

Altamente recomendable para los amantes de usar antes la razón que la pasión para superar niveles.

39507026.review:
Mir gefällt das Spiel sehr gut und ich kann es jedem empfehlen der das Szenario ansprechend findet und das Spielprinzip nicht komplett ablehnt.
Die Steuerung ist sehr präzise, sodass die Fehler die man zwingendermaßen macht, immer auf einen selbst zurückzuführen sind.
Auch die Grafik gefällt mir gut und ist zudem übersichtlich und gut lesbar.
Der Schwierigkeitsgrad nimmt im laufe des Spiels deutlich zu, sodass auch für erfahrene Spieler, die vielleicht Desperados gespielt haben, noch genug Herausforderungen vorhanden sind.
